availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Located in Ontario, Canada. Located on the Niagara River. Location of a British fort from the War of 1812.

bibl.p: Sherman Zavitz, “Siege Of Fort Erie, War Of 1812.,” in The Canadian Encyclopedia: Historica Canada, article published March 4, 2011, http://www.thecanadianencyclopedia.ca/en/article/siege-of-fort-erie-war-of-1812/ (accessed June 19, 2017); John N. Jackson and Hugh J. Gayler, “Fort Erie.,” in The Canadian Encyclopedia: Historica Canada, article published October 19, 2012, http://www.thecanadianencyclopedia.ca/en/article/fort-erie/ (accessed June 19, 2017).
